## ITileDecoder interface

General type decoder which can be used to provide decoded tile data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITileDecoder 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [configure(styleSet, definitions, languages, options)](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.configure.md) | Set decoder configuration.<!-- -->Configuration will take effect for next calls to results of \[\[decodeTile\]\], \[\[decodeThemedTile\]\].<!-- -->Non-existing (<code>undefined</code>) options (including styleSet) are not changed. |
|  [connect()](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.connect.md) | Connect to decoder.<!-- -->Should be implemented by implementations that use special resources that decode jobs like WebWorkers. |
|  [decodeTile(data, tileKey, projection, requestController)](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.decodetile.md) | Decode tile into transferrable geometry.<!-- -->Decode raw tile data (encoded with datasource specific encoding) into transferrable representation of tile's geometry.<!-- -->See \[\[DecodedTile\]\]. |
|  [dispose()](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.dispose.md) | Free all resources associated with this decoder.<!-- -->Called by users when decoder is no longer used and all resources must be freed. |
|  [getTileInfo(data, tileKey, projection, requestController)](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.gettileinfo.md) | Get tile info.<!-- -->Get map features metadata associated with tile. See \[\[TileInfo\]\]. |
